procedural_fairness: Applicants bear the burden of proving eligibility
Visa officers are not obligated to engage in dialogue about completeness unless concerns involve credibility or genuineness
evidence_presented: applicant failed to provide sufficient evidence of Jasmin's full-time enrollment and attendance
decision_reasoning: no additional documents were submitted, indicating a lack of effort by the applicant
cause_of_action: Jasmin did not meet family class requirements due to insufficient evidence of full-time student status
procedure_followed: Judicial review examined whether fairness was upheld during the visa application process
